KARLOFF THRILLER -2x13- THE REMARKABLE MRS HAWK (12/18/1961)

"If you ever yearn for a small farm, a few chickens, a cow, and a pig, or two, or three, I particularly recommend this story. Because, as sure as my name is Boris Karloff, you&#039;ll learn some animal husbandry, that even the experts never dreamed of..."

Mrs. Hawk has a talent for raising prize hogs - but the secret of her success is more sinister than anyone could imagine.

Cast: Boris Karloff (Host) , Jo Van Fleet (Mrs. Hawk), John Carradine (Jason Longfellow), Paul Newlan (Sheriff Tom Willetts), Hal Baylor (Pete Grogan), Bruce Dern (Johnny), Martin Eric (Larkin), Donald Elson (Al), Kevin Enright (Al&#039;s Helper), Hurley Bell (The Drifter)
Writer: Donald S. Sanford
Director: John Brahm
